Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Announcement \An*nounce"ment\, n. The act of announcing, or giving notice; that which announces; proclamation; publication. [1913 Webster]

announcement n 1: a formal public statement; "the government made an announcement about changes in the drug war"; "a declaration of independence" [syn: {proclamation}, {annunciation}, {declaration}] 2: a public statement about something that is happening or going to happen; "the announcement appeared in the local newspaper"; "the promulgation was written in English" [syn: {promulgation}]
